short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Focus Ex is a tool aiding online reading for those with attention issues, by customizing text and reducing visual distractions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is the beta version of Focus Ex, a Chrome extension designed for individuals with a short attention span or other focus challenges while reading.
